Environment

I can. 

I love travel and have had my life profoundly enriched by jaywalking into other worlds, and meeting people less fortunate than myself. Due to an awareness of my own good fortune and all the gifts I have been given via travel, I figure Kiva loans are the least I can do. It's not charity, it's just the same kind of helping hand we in the west receive on a regular basis.

lenders.name: j peer
lenders.loan_because:

This micro-lending is neat...I hope it works out over the long run...and there continues to be no "religious" or "church" strings attached...
lenders.occupational_info: Play loud organs and honky pianos...

lenders.name: Michael & Danielle

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: I believe that governments of all stripes ignore the little people of this world. Action at the grass roots is more effective than grand schemes. As a long-time typesetter I know that even the biggest picture is made up of thousands of tiny dots.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a freelance copy editor and columnist for a prestigious Australian geographical magazine. I do freelance work for publishers, authors and printers. I am also a musician.

lenders.occupation: Starting to open a shop to help Philippinas
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired by Clinton and Oprah and I have done donations all my life and I hope that more and more people participate in giving and make a change in the world, even a small change.
lenders.occupational_info: I am planning to open a shop to help Philippinas in Hong Kong because they are a bit deprivated, I hope the shop helps some who work so hard just to get a home back in the Philippines, for their family or for themselves!

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: For I mean not that other men be eased, and ye burdened; But by an equality, that now at this time your abundance may be a supply for their want, that their abundance also may be a supply for your want: that there may be equality; As it is written, he that had gathered much had nothing over; and he that had gathered little had no lack. (2 Corinthians 8:13-15)

lenders.loan_because: one act of random kindness a day does make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: CEO/Founder of an Information Technology Solutions Group.

lenders.name: Indri

lenders.occupational_info: Leaving my full-time job to relocate to Thailand, I enjoy being a stay-home mum, learning domestic skills and having options of  social activities & works to get involved in.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I want to give a helping hand to someone in need.

lenders.name: Tracy
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me and I want everyone to be able to have a good quality of life.
lenders.occupational_info: Sales

lenders.name: Stuart
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the area of international education--helping to build educational programs overseas. Being part of Kiva is a great experience & is a personal way that we can all give a hand to others who may need it.

lenders.name: Willy
lenders.loan_because:
I was hit so hard by Oprah's show at 11 January 2008 on the Hallmark Channel. I was told there's a Kiva.

I think it's our responsibility to help those who need a help. We have been truly blessed in our lives and we are happy to give something back.

Well i am just a person who trying to help people here even though it's just only a little money. I believe it does help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work in a small advertising company named Pomato Asia in Jakarta, Indonesia Country. I work with my 2 bosses and 3 friends. They are as like as my family. They love us, they care, they make us laugh so hilarious, they teach how to make a good design, and so many other things.

Hopefully it does impact you

lenders.name: Edith
lenders.loan_because: My Mother gave me a Kiva loan for christmas and it was one of my favorite presents. I love the idea of helping people establish their own businesses. Instead of just handing them their dream, it gives them the tools to achieve it on their own, which I believe is much more special.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an Anthropologist

lenders.name: Ed  Terry
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed to have a steady job and loving family.  It's only fair that I share these blessings as best I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work to fund female-led enterprises. I think it is important to support these endeavors as these women are positive role models in their communities and helps to diminish gender stigmas and prejudices. I hope my efforts help.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I can and I should.  I have been helped in my life and I need to return the help.
lenders.occupational_info: I represent child.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: People have blessed me, now it's time for me to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I have been the beneficiary of much love and support as I transformed my dream into reality. lenders.occupational_info: I work with women who want to transform their lives, just like you are. Women who want to make a difference to their own lives. I teach them how to stop being fearful, enjoy being the amazing women they are, and to hold their heads up high in this world.

lenders.name: Tracey
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping others in need is not just the right thing to do but gives you some form of accomplishment no matter how little or big it is, the thought and desire to help, if we can, we should do :)
lenders.occupational_info: Im a stay at home single parent of 2 boys.

lenders.name: Natalie
lenders.loan_because: I feel very blessed in my life and would like to give something back to those, who struggle to have a good existence. By lending, I hope to give someone the opportunity to start or continue something, he or she can be proud of.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a university in Egypt, which is still under establishment. lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: We should help each other.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a policeman. I'm sure it's the same in most places around the world.

lenders.name: Carol

God has seen me thru many troubles and trials, and never once failed me - he has picked me up and dusted me off many times - and for his forgiveness-mercy-love and kindness - I fill moved to give to help others - that they may find Christ and his light thru their journey on this earth - and maybe - just maybe  by making this loan helped  played a part in it all..
